page.title: Talk:Kidnapping and murder of Nachshon Wachsman

revision.comment: /* How was he murdered? */ editor not allowed here, per [[WP:ARBPIA3]]
revision.text:
{{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Biography |living=no |class=C |military-priority=Low |listas=Wachsman, Nachson |military-work-group=yes }} {{WPMILHIST|class=C|B1=n|B2=y|B3=y|B4=y|B5=y|Biography=yes|Middle-Eastern=yes}} {{WikiProject Israel|class=C|importance=low}} {{WikiProject Palestine|class=C|importance=low}} {{WikiProject Terrorism|class=C}} }}
== Name ==
His name is reported in several places as [[Nachshon Wachsman]], and someone has redirected that page here. Is Nachson definately correct? [[User:Timb0h|Timb0h]] ([[User talk:Timb0h|talk]]) 12:14, 5 December 2007 (UTC)
== Requested move ==
I suggest that this page be moved from "Nachson Wachsman" to "Nachs'''h'''on Wachsman." This is consistent with the Hebrew original form of his name. It also matches the preference of Google, which prefers the latter version by a 10 to 1 margin.
The same change ought to be made to the Cesky version of this article (see interwiki links). [[User:Shalom|Shalom]] ([[User talk:Shalom|Hello]] â€¢ [[Special:Contributions/Shalom|Peace]]) 15:57, 23 December 2007 (UTC)
* '''Support'''. The [[Journal of Palestine Studies]] uses the spelling "Nachs'''h'''on Wachsman" '''exclusively'''. See [http://links.jstor.org/sici?sici=0377-919X%28199624%2925%3A2%3C21%3ATPOIST%3E2.0.CO%3B2-C Vol. 25, No. 2, Page. 27]; [http://links.jstor.org/sici?sici=0377-919X%28199522%2924%3A4%3C143%3ADASM%3E2.0.CO%3B2-A Vol. 24, No. 4, Page. 154] and [http://links.jstor.org/sici?sici=0377-919X%28199723%2927%3A1%3C136%3ADASM%3E2.0.CO%3B2-1 Vol. 27, No. 1, Page. 152] ([[JSTOR]] subscription required). --[[User:Lox|Lox]] ([[User talk:Lox|t]],[[Special:Contributions/Lox|c]]) 10:46, 31 December 2007 (UTC) :Yup, this not a too controversial move, IMHO. '''<font face="Arial">[[Special:Contributions/Maxim|<font color="#FF7133">Maxim</font>]]<sub><small>[[User talk:Maxim|<font color="blue">(talk)</font>]]</small></sub></font>''' 13:57, 2 January 2008 (UTC)
==proper article name== The article is '''not''' a biography as the name suggested therefore I renamed the article to a more appropriate name which was used in the media to describe the event. [[User:TheCuriousGnome|TheCuriousGnome]] ([[User talk:TheCuriousGnome|talk]]) 15:05, 21 September 2011 (UTC)
== Hitchhiking ==
Some (unsourced, based on what I know, sorry) notes regarding hitchhiking in Israel: * Many of the settlements are, well, small and rural places. Hichhiking is naturally common in rural places all over Israel. * The regulations for soldiers not to hitchhike existed even before the Vaxman incident. And even today some soldiers will hitchhike. [[User:Tzafrir|Tzafrir]] ([[User talk:Tzafrir|talk]]) 13:13, 17 June 2014 (UTC)
